Subskills.name: Sharp Edged Shredders
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by shredder trap.

Subskills.name: Blood Hungry Blades
Subskills.description: Chance for shredder trap to grow larger on hit.

Subskills.name: Comeback with a Cut
Subskills.description: Shredders now home back to you after a short period dealing damage on the way.

Subskills.name: Bits and Pieces
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash smaller flying shredders on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Slayer's Adrenaline
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using shredder trap.

Subskills.name: Less is More
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost when using shredder trap.

Subskills.name: Forging Hands
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using shredder trap.

Subskills.name: Gigashredder
Subskills.description: Unleash a big shredder that slowly homes towards the closest monster on range. You can now only spawn one shredder.

Subskills.name: Cutting Power
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Slay the Wounded
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Woodshop
Subskills.description: Throw multiple smaller shredders at once. Shredder trap now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Circular Cutting
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple orbiting shredders around you.
